name: Space Battleship
description:
Space Battleship is inspired by the classic game Sink Ships - the goal of the game is to destroy the enemy fleet. However, in Space Battleship you don't fight against the enemy fleet on the sea, but in space. As a player you have the possibility to choose between two difficulty levels and to play against a computer or against a human. Additionally there is the possibility to let two computers play against each other.

 If you find the game fun and enjoyable, I would appreciate your comments.
